SEARCH
Package fr.uge.patchwork2

Class GraphicElements

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork2.GraphicElements
public class GraphicElements extends Object
Contains multiple graphical functions using zen5 to draw numerous elements related to the game patchwork
Author:
Herve Nguyen and Gabriel Radoniaina

      context - ApplicationContext
      patch - the patch
      buttonOwned - button owned by the player

    • isClickOnQuiltBoard

      public static boolean isClickOnQuiltBoard(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, Point2D.Float click)
      Checks if the given click coordinates corresponds to a click on the quiltboard
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext
      click - the coordinates of the click
      Returns:
      boolean, true if it is on the quiltboard, otherwise false.

    • getAnchorClickPosition

      public static Point getAnchorClickPosition(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, Point2D.Float click)
      Assuming the given click coordinates corresponds to a click on the quiltboard. Returns the point that represents the square of the quiltboard that was clicked on.
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext
      click - the coordinates of the click
      Returns:
      the aforementioned point
